## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
```
```{r}
# data clearning
sim_data <- sim_data_raw %>%
  mutate(
    color = paste("#", color, sep = "")
  )
```

```{r}
population_size <- sim_data %>%
  group_by(time) %>%
  summarise(count = n())

ggplot(data = population_size, aes(time, count)) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
sim_data %>% 
  #filter(time == 6000) %>%
  mutate(passiveEnergyChange = autoGen - energyConsumption) %>%
  select(speed, size, passiveEnergyChange, color) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = speed, y =size, colour = color)) +
    scale_color_identity() +
    geom_point()
```
